name: California Children's Services
description: CCS is a statewide program that serves children and youth under 21 years old with certain medical conditions. CCS has two main programs: - Medical case management to help children with certain conditions get medical care. - The Medical Therapy Program (MTP), which provides physical therapy (PT) and occupational therapy (OT) Qualification requirements: - Birth to age 21 - Live in San Francisco - Have a chronic, disabling, or life threatening medical condition that is a CCS eligible medical condit
